p: Data obtained from every experimental or control animal were included in the analysis. Results included male fertility, gonadotoxic effects, pre- and post-implantation death, number of newborns, and offspring postnatal development. Statistical analysis of the results was conducted using Statistica software, version 10 with the “SygmaStat 3.5” package (Systat Software Inc., CA, USA). Numeric data presented in Table 2 were analyzed using a two-way analysis of variance (ANOVA). For the comparison of experimental groups, a post hoc Dunn’s multiple comparisons test was performed.
